CustomField.formula: if(OR(AND( Total_Current_Income_Period__c > Total_Previous_Income_Period__c ,Total_Current_Income_Period__c <(Total_Previous_Income_Period__c*1.2)),Total_Current_Income_Period__c<Total_Previous_Income_Period__c), Total_Current_Income_Period__c, if(Total_Current_Income_Period__c > (1.2*Total_Previous_Income_Period__c),Total_Previous_Income_Period__c*1.2, null))
CustomField.label: Income for servicing purposes
